quote: I am abroad in the night with my servants. We come to smoke the northern lights, to rape the Wendigo, to melt igloos with streams of hot, bloody piss. To see and see.”“Oh. You’re a bit east.
quote_letters: I AM ABROAD IN THE NIGHT WITH MY SERVANTS WE COME TO SMOKE THE NORTHERN LIGHTS TO RAPE THE WENDIGO TO MELT IGLOOS WITH STREAMS OF HOT BLOODY PISS TO SEE AND SEEOH YOURE A BIT EAST
